metadata.title: CVE-2021-3773 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw in netfilter could allow a network-connected attacker to inferopenvpn connection endpoint information for further use in traditionalnetwork attacks.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
